modName: Collection of HDT Physics of Clothes Hair Etc
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][center]Collection of HDT Physics Clothes/Hair/Etc.[/center]
[color=#d0e0e3][b][Gist][/b][/color][/size]
If you're here for the Bouncy Boobs kind of HDT, then look elsewhere. I'm talking about cloth, hair and others.

I will list down all I can find here. Download the mod from the link provided but I will upload some Bodyslider files, optional xml fixes and ESP changes (Translation/Balancing/Fixes).

The list is prioritize based on my preferences. 
[color=#e06666]Cloak[/color] > [color=#cc4125]Cape[/color] > [color=#f6b26b]Robe [/color]> [color=#ffd966]Cuirass [/color]> [color=#93c47d]Skirt [/color]>[color=#76a5af] Hair[/color] > [color=#6d9eeb]Hood[/color] > [color=#6fa8dc]Gloves/Boot[/color][color=#3d85c6]s[/color] > [color=#8e7cc3]Accessories [/color]> [color=#c27ba0]Weapons
[/color]
[color=#d0e0e3][Requirements][/color]
[size=3]1. [/size][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/]HDT PE [/url]
[/size][color=#ffffff][size=3]
Optional (When needed by the mod)
1. [url=https://www.loverslab.com/files/file/1795-heels-sound/]Heel Sound[/url]
2. [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT Highheels System[/url]

[/size][/color][size=3]Membership (Sometimes you need to be registered to download there)
[/size][size=3]1. Various[/size]
